title: A SMALL DONATION IS APPRECIATED
body:
I am planning on buying a skin and it is 1350 RP. Sadly, I only have 1348 RP. I would really appreciate if Riot would be generous and donate me 2 RP so I don't have to make a payment for the RP.

- Scorpianox

replies.body:
Should be able to make that happen, we don't really do donations though. Making a trade is more our kind of thing!

Shoot me your best sketch of the skin you're trying to get and I can slide that RP right on over!

I am new to this website, so could you give me a good email address to reach you so I may send you the sketch? That would be greatly appreciated. 

- Scorpianox

Can't really get it in an e-mail but if you take a screenshot of it using something like Gyazo you could post it here. Or just shoot that picture over to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), that would work too.
Thanks dude. It was an easy sketch but I put more effort in than I do playing. Thanks for the sweet RP!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
